channel.title: Server Sponsor Picture
channel.description:
I am making a rsps and one of my ranks doesn't have a picture, and i was going to add a server sponsor rank with a little picture beside the name like donors have. Any ideas on how i do this.
EDIT: You know when donator's talk and they have a donor crown beside there name not in yell but in public, What folder do I edit to have server sponsor have there crown beside there name?

item.title: Server Sponsor Picture
item.dc:creator: @French_Fries French Fries
item.description:
@French_Fries wrote:

I feel really dumb now because all I had to do was put some picture in a folder and done facepalm

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

Im thinking that you add an image in the sprites folder in the client and then find where in the code it assigns an image to a rank
